name: combo_floodfill.zh
author: Alucard648
info: Flood fill combo replacement in the game, like Paint. Done on request by P-Tux7.
description: This small library contains a pair of functions that can cause combo flood-fill like replacement like in Paint, if run every frame. For instance each combo A that is adjacent to combo B will turn into combo B, and that is every frame, spreading "infection" like "forest fire". And yes, example script allows such forest fires.
setup: Import and compile the library. Nothing extra needed.ffc script BurningTrees//Test script. One fiery spark - And it`s forest fire!!//Set up 2 combos, a normal tree, and then fire that cycles into burnt tree.//D0 - tree combo.
